page.title: 04LONGFORD POST OFFICE
page.content: The post office in Longford is sixty years old. The post mistress has been the post mistress for four years. The person who owned the shop before lived there for eighteen years. The shop is part of the post office and in the shop she sells food like fruit and vegetables and ice cream. She sells lots of fruit like lemons, oranges, bananas, raisins, apples and lots more. She also sells sweets and pet food and house-hold things. The customers leave their pets outside. The old people come in for a chat because they get lonely. The farmers come on their tractors and have a drink at harvest time. The post mistess said one night the alarm went off and she thought there were burglars but when she went into the post office it was only a fault on the alarm.
